author: Hojojicek
title: Best power-up pack.  For sure.
review:
The play value of this one is superb and it can also generate huge amount of coins (just put it on, let Mario lay on stomach and then flip him like crazy in all directions, and there are extra coins for spins and flips). The accompanying music is also fun.

Plus, visually it is really appealing and included white platforms are quite rare for now. :)
